title: New and planned on Connector 365 Online Help
description: Recent content in New and planned on Connector 365 Online Help

items.title: V1.0.0.0 & Roadmap
items.content_html:
New and planned

Version 1.0.0.0

  • Automatic attachment of reminded invoices to reminder on sending of reminder
  • Control of sending by reminder level
  • Control of sending by reminder method

Planned functions for future versions

  • Automatic attachment of delivery bills
